title: Ethereum Merge Reshapes Crypto Universe
itunes:title: Ethereum Merge Reshapes Crypto Universe
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Crypto Reporter Olga Kharif talk about popular crypto network Ethereum's software change know as “the Merge.” Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Technology Analyst Mandeep Singh discusses Twitter shareholders approving Elon Musk's $44 billion buyout. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist John Authers shares the details of his story Markets Need a Less Rosy View of Inflation News. And we Drive to the Close with Carol Schleif, Deputy CIO at BMO Family Office.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
